actions.name: Chloroplast
actions.description: Effect: While Sunny Weather is active, the user takes 25% less damage from Physical- and Special- Category attacks, and the user's Grass-Type attacks deal 20% more damage. The user is treated as having the Grass Type for the effects of Sunny Weather.
